title: Elizabeth Warren Blasts Donald Trump For Not 'Draining The Swamp' | The Huffington Post

organizations.name: huffington post elizabeth warren blasts donald trump

text: Elizabeth Warren Blasts Donald Trump For Not 'Draining The Swamp' "It's like the most impressive 180 degree switch that you've ever seen." 02/10/2017 06:23 am ET Lee Moran Trends Editor, The Huffington Post Sen. Elizabeth Warren (D-Mass) called out President Donald Trump in an interview posted online Thursday for failing to deliver on his campaign pledge to “ drain the swamp .” Trump had performed what could be “the most impressive 180 degree switch that you’ve ever seen” following his presidential election win in Nov. 2016, Warren told Attn: editor-in-chief Matthew Segal. Citing Trump’s promise to voters that he would “drain the swamp” and “get rid of those Wall Street guys,” Warren took issue with the new president for almost immediately bringing in Goldman Sachs bankers , lobbyists and CEOs of giant companies to help him govern. In doing so, Warren said Trump had turned over the country “to the very people that he had railed against during the campaign.” Check out the full interview above. Related Coverage
